metadata.title: CVE-2022-48693 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soc: brcmstb: pm-arm: Fix refcount leak and __iomem leak bugsIn brcmstb_pm_probe(), there are two kinds of leak bugs:(1) we need to add of_node_put() when for_each__matching_node() breaks(2) we need to add iounmap() for each iomap in fail path

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
